member.name: T:TCPIP.CommOperator
member.summary: The Server-part class. Manages the incoming requests and distributes them to the listeners.

member.name: P:TCPIP.CommOperator.externalIP
member.summary: After the GetIPAsync method will be executed, this property will contain obtained ip.

member.name: M:TCPIP.CommOperator.GetIPAsync
member.summary: The static method that returns this computer's external ip asynchronously.
